Implement Preferred Days Off filtering functionality

- Replace Popover with Dialog for calendar selection (more reliable interaction)
- Parse effectiveDates field to extract pairing base dates (e.g., "OCT12")
- Calculate all dates covered by pairing using base date + pairingDays
- Filter out pairings with ANY day conflicting with preferred days off
- Skip preferredDaysOff from Active Filters display (only show count in button)
- Use client-side filtering when preferredDaysOff is set to enable proper exclusion
- Display selected dates inside calendar dialog with individual remove buttons

This enables pilots to select their preferred days off and automatically filter out any pairings that would require them to fly on those dates. For example, a 4-day pairing starting Oct 12 covers Oct 12-15, so selecting any of those dates as days off will exclude that pairing.
